scripts.build: npx tsc && npx tsc -p tsconfig.binaryen.json && npm run copy-files
scripts.copy-files: mv dist/binaryen.js dist/src/backend/binaryen/glue/ && cp -r ../../../lib/builtin/* dist/lib/builtin/ && cp -r ../../../src/backend/binaryen/lib/interface ./dist/src/backend/binaryen/lib/interface && cp -r assets ./dist/tools/playground/server
